text: Jeri Taylor (June 30, 1938 â€“ October 24, 2024) was an American television screenwriter and producer. He wrote many episodes of the Star Trek: The Next Generation and Star Trek: Voyager series. Taylor died at an assisted living facility in Davis, California, on October 24, 2024, at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American television writers Category:American television producers Category:People from Bloomington, Indiana Category:Writers from Indiana
